channel.title: Faith on Shrewsbury, Pennsylvania

item.title: My faith
item.description: I’m a Christian, and I want to follow Jesus. I was raised in the church but left, did many sinful things along the way, and within the past couple of years have found my way back out of a sense of guilt. Now I’m trying to stay for better reasons â€” primarily that I love God for what he offers and want to be a productive member of his kingdom.
